STATE
v.
MARK. No. COA06-496. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed March 6, 2007. Certification March 26, 2007. Appeal from the Guilford (01CRS105414, 01CRS105416, 01CRS105410).

Case reported without published opinion. Appeal dismissed in 01CRS105410 and 01CRS105416; Affirmed in 01CRS105414.
